trans-unit.source: The abstract base class that defines methods for serializing and deserializing versions of WS-Trust request (RST) messages.
trans-unit.target: 抽象基类，该类定义序列化和反序列化 Ws-trust (RST) 请求消息的版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, checks if the specified XML reader is positioned at a WS-Trust RequestSecurityToken element.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将检查指定的 XML 读取器将位于 WS 信任 RequestSecurityToken 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object from which to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>从中进行读取的对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader is positioned at an RST element that the serializer can read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果读取器定位在序列化程序可以读取; 的 RST 元素否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> class that this class can serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>此类可以序列化或反序列化的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads a custom element.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，读取自定义元素。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the current element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>定位在当前元素上的对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> ，其中包含当前序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes the RST from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，反序列化从 RST<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象传递给<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The XML reader over the RST.
trans-unit.target: 通过 RST XML 读取器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> ，其中包含当前序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object if the deserialization was successful.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>对象反序列化是否成功。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads a child element inside the RST.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，读取 RST 中的子元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned at an element to read inside the RST.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象定位在元素内部 RST 读取。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object that is being populated from the reader.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>正在从读取器填充的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> ，其中包含当前序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object that has been deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 验证<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>消息反序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object to validate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>要验证对象。

trans-unit.source: requestSecurityToken is .
trans-unit.target: requestSecurityTokenis .

trans-unit.source: A WS-Trust Issue request for an asymmetric key did not specify the UseKey element.
trans-unit.target: 非对称密钥的 WS 信任问题请求未指定 UseKey 元素。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the supported elements on the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，则将受支持的元素写入上<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>写入流的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object being serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>对象要序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to write to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>要写入到对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> ，其中包含当前序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object into the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，序列化指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>对象插入<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>要序列化对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to write to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>要写入到对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> ，其中包含当前序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes a child element inside the RST.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时写入 RST 中的子元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to which the RST is being serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>RST 要被序列化为对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object that is being serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>正在序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> ，其中包含当前序列化上下文。
